title: Uptown (Billy Taylor album)
text:
Uptown is a <a href="live%20album">live album</a> by American jazz pianist <a href="Billy%20Taylor">Billy Taylor</a> featuring tracks recorded in 1960 and released on the <a href="Riverside%20Records">Riverside</a> label. 
Reception.
<a href="Allmusic">Allmusic</a> awarded the album 3 stars stating "Although Taylor's activities as a highly articulate spokesman for jazz have sometimes overshadowed his playing, he shows throughout this fine CD reissue that he has long ranked among the best". 
Track listing.
"All compositions by Billy Taylor except as indicated"
